DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe patient experience , include pain score , use pain medication , resumption usual activity , bowel function post-operative period follow robotic urogynecologic surgery . Additionally , describe peri-operative parameter robot-assisted urogynecologic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Recovery After Robotic Urogynecological Surgery : The Patient 's Perspective
DOC.criteria: Women underwent DaVinciassisted laparoscopic surgery Completion postoperative quality assurance questionnaire 09/2007 09/2008 Any woman meet inclusion criterion
